member.summary: Gets the file fingerprints from the application folder
member.param: The path to the application folder.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: Return a dictionary of file fingerprints, with sha1 as key and a list of file fingerprints as value.

member.summary: Creates a zip archive containing specific files from the application folder

The files that will be added to the archive.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: An open stream of the zip file

member.name: M:CloudFoundry.CloudController.Common.PushTools.AppPushTools.GetFileFingerprints(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the file fingerprints from the application folder As the sha1 is calculated based on the content of the file, there is a possibility that one key can have multiple fingerprints (duplicate files)
member.param: The path to the application folder
The cancellation token.
member.returns: Return a dictionary of file fingerprints, with sha1 as key and a list of file fingerprints as value.
